transcript.speaker: (In Moltar's monitor
transcript.dialogue: Guest Star Jerry SpringerWritten by Bill Faulkner)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh no, it's all right. Really. You're just not very good.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Ha-ha. You really mailed that one in.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Aren't there usually questions and answers, or am I just wrong about that?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I just keep thinking about last week's show. It had everything. Action, girls, kung-fu sex...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'll spin your head off so fast it'll travel back in time!! (echoing) To a period when bugs wore suits and opened doors while saying "Thank you" and "Yes, please."

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Um, I have no response to that.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It's like working with children, Jerry.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Now, listen up as I tell the tale of 15 sexy kung-fu minutes.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: By "create," you mean write, produce, direct and star in?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Then, yes. I created it for you. For Christmas.

transcript.speaker: Sarah Jessica Parker
transcript.dialogue: In my wildest fantasies, I never imagined that I would really be invited to be on your show.

transcript.speaker: Sarah Jessica Parker
transcript.dialogue: You have a... I don't know, something about you.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Would you like to have some of my sex with me?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (voice-over) Okay, this is a complete lie!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: We'll check the tape! We'll check it right after the show, buddy!

transcript.speaker: Jerry Springer
transcript.dialogue: I wasn't told that this...is this a...?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It's about over unless you shut up!

transcript.speaker: Jerry Springer
transcript.dialogue: I don't wanna be a guest on a talk show!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Say it! Say it again, monster!

transcript.speaker: Jerry Springer
transcript.dialogue: I never wanted to be on!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: "Whoa!" is what America's gonna be sayin' when I spin his head off so fast, it'll travel back in time!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, you want the time-travel spinning head!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It means there was a time when bugs were obedient to man. This clearly isn't that time!

transcript.speaker: Jerry Springer
transcript.dialogue: (sighs) I don't know, but we were kind of--

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: As I moved in to enjoy the sex, terror rained down from the sky...

transcript.speaker: Sarah Jessica Parker
transcript.dialogue: Um, I can't tell. You're hidden by a desk.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (voice-over) I was pinned. To the earth.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (voice-over) Pfft! By a freakin' ceiling tile.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: This was no ordinary ceiling tile, Jerry.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: This was The C. Ling Tile!

transcript.speaker: C. Ling Tile
transcript.dialogue: No, no, no. Correction: The pleasure is all for me! (He starts spraying water on Space Ghost's head) Sprinkler! Sprinkler!

transcript.speaker: C. Ling Tile
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Now I will freeze you! At 60 degrees! Cool air vent! Go! (starts blowing air on Space Ghost)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: He's lowering the temperature of my body!

transcript.speaker: C. Ling Tile
transcript.dialogue: You...(bangs Space Ghost on the head)...deal with it!

transcript.speaker: C. Ling Tile
transcript.dialogue: Asbestos powder! (Start spraying powder in Space Ghost's face)

transcript.speaker: C. Ling Tile
transcript.dialogue: Get up! Get up and face the powder!

transcript.speaker: C. Ling Tile
transcript.dialogue: (sniffs) Mmmm! Mmmmm! Suck it in, Ghost! And prepare to die!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Not while I'm alive! Medical school!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost has mastered the five magics!

transcript.speaker: C. Ling Tile
transcript.dialogue: You don't have to throw that!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Because you're dead! (Space Ghost throws the ball, causing C. Ling Tile to burst into flames)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, it looks like C. Ling will fit in perfectly...on the roof...in jail!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, that's one tile that needs to be replaced!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Now, don't we have some sex to take care of?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's how I defeated C. Ling and then, of course, did sex. (pause) It was all action, Jerry. Magic and action.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And yet, very true. And yet, very true.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: You're insane! You never even took your clothes off!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Of course I didn't! It was sex!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, I will spin your head so fast it'll collect its own atmosphere...with gravity.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Because you weren't alive back then.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Well, that ain't how I remember it - AT ALL!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What was that? Oh, the lying machine just turned on!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: First off, I was lookin' real good.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (voice-over) Anyway, Space Ghost was droning on and on about he packs for trips...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: ...pairs of underwear. And I always bring one entire knapsack full of soap.

transcript.speaker: Sarah Jessica Parker
transcript.dialogue: (laughing) Right. Uh, is your full name "Space Ghost Coast to Coast" or is it just "Space Ghost"?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Uh, I don't know. Hey! Want to see how high I can jump?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I can jump high! I can go real high!

transcript.speaker: Sarah Jessica Parker
transcript.dialogue: (laughing) No, I thought maybe you were joking.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (voice-over) That went on for....EVER! Luckily, Boston came by and picked me up.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: They said they needed a keyboardist and I said, "I'm your man-tis!"

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: They had this really cool ship! There was this whole freakin' city on a flyin' UFO guitar, powered by rock 'n' roll!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And where did your friends, Boston, take you?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: They were on their way to populate a new world where everyone would just rock forever!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: All right! Who wants to ROCK?! There was not a life form we didn't rock. (The Boston ship streaks across the horizons of several planets where various creatures "rock out" to their irresistable heavy Boston sound) Is everybody ready to rock?! Yeah! Play some guitar!! Catch it! Man and mantis, rocking side-by-side. We're gonna rock your face! Ow! Who's ready to ROCK 'N' ROLL?!? Me and Boston: just like that. We rocked everyone we met. Oh god, it was beautiful. And when they were all rocked out, they dropped me off at home. THANKS, BOSTON! THAT ROCKED!! HEY BOSTON! KEEP ON ROCKIN'!!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Those guys know how to rock. (Space Ghost is still bouncing around the studio)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Like G.I. Joe! With his pants blown off! In the war! Aggh! Incoming! (Space Ghost lands head-first behind his desk)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: See that? I touched the ceiling!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: And that's when you started cryin' for Momma!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (crying) Mom-maaaaaa!!! (voice-over) I wasn't saying "Momma," I was saying, "Trauma." Like the kind I was about to dish out.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Besides, if I cried, it was because of kung-fu lasers...and starvation.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: This is all a damned lie!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Don't listen to him, Jerry! I'll blow your brains clear into that river bank, Zorak.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, sure you will. (drinks from his coffee mug)

transcript.speaker: Jerry Springer
transcript.dialogue: But you were friends. Why would you do that?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Why are you always trying to get ahead of me, mantis?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: First of all, I had the beautiful rock hair.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost was in the thing, talking to... someone.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I had everything under control, as usual. When all of the sudden...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: And that was when I decided I just need to spent a lot more time in church.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No, you know what? I told it wrong. I had broken my lungs, that's what it was. And I was in the process of gluing them back together. So there I am..

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: ...and I start hearing this scary piano music. (scary piano music in background) So I turn around and there's this guy standing there.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: And he's wearing this mask, and I'm like, "What's up with that?" And he's got this knife, and he just starts coming at me, and the knife's like going, "Drrrvvv! Drrrvvvv! Drrrrvv!"

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Oh, you know him? 'Cause he was coming right at me.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah. He's in this movie - "HALLOWEEN!" The one I loaned to you A YEAR AGO! MY movie, remember?!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Okay, all right, okay. So maybe it was a movie. I guess I was watching it with some of my friends.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I don't know if you know 'em. They're the rock band Boston?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: He doesn't know 'em. Look at his face! He's lyin'!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: The trueness of one's truth, Zorak, is clearly based on their vernacular inaccuracies.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes, Zorak. Everyone knows that to be true. And you're dumb for not knowing that.

transcript.speaker: Jerry Springer
transcript.dialogue: I have to be going soon.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (chuckles) As Moltar clearly said, the vascular...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You know if you couldn't understand the first time, I shouldn't have to waste my mouth saying it again.

transcript.speaker: Jerry Springer
transcript.dialogue: It's not like I have another job or...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What I'm saying is... saying things are not relative.

transcript.speaker: Jerry Springer
transcript.dialogue: This can't be during your sweeps.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And that, my friends, is the only truth.

transcript.speaker: Jerry Springer
transcript.dialogue: Is there an end to any of this?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: The other truth... is that I totally did sex with that girl.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes, I think you can say the two of us did that activity.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I totally hung out with Boston.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: ...at the theater, if you catch my drift.

transcript.speaker: Jerry Springer
transcript.dialogue: (into his lapel mic) Hey thanks, guys!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And we worked it from the balcony to below.
